original_title: Илья Соболев: В поисках моей аудитории
overview: The concert program and the program "In Search of My Audience" for 2019-2020. It was a program in which Ilya Sobolev traveled to more than 50 cities and shot a concert in Perm. Various topics, from the president to the genitals, but the improvisation that is present at all Ilya’s speeches remains unchanged.
title: Ilya Sobolev: In Search of My Audience
